original:
Everyone here will now accept you
as one of our group.
Let's polish our skills and shine
bright again someday!
translation:
Everyone here will now accept you
as one of our group.
Let's polish our skills and shine
bright again someday!

original:
So you've come!
I'm your final opponent, nume!
translation:
So you've come!
I'm your final opponent, nume!

original:
What's with that face!?
You're so rude, nume!
I've changed, nume!

Can't you see that?
translation:
What's with that face!?
You're so rude, nume!
I've changed, nume!

Can't you see that?

original:
Looks like you can't...
Then let me show you, nume!
translation:
Looks like you can't...
Then let me show you, nume!

original:
How's that!? It's what you get for
underestimating me, nume!
This isn't the end, nume!
I'll be even stronger next time!
translation:
How's that!? It's what you get for
underestimating me, nume!
This isn't the end, nume!
I'll be even stronger next time!

original:
There's nothing left that I can do,
nume.
You've worked hard since coming
to this world, nume.
You've done well, nume!
translation:
There's nothing left that I can do,
nume.
You've worked hard since coming
to this world, nume.
You've done well, nume!

original:
Don't forget about this world,
okay, nume?
translation:
Don't forget about this world,
okay, nume?

original:
How are you feeling since coming
to the Digital World?
Occasionally those who come here
will become over-excited,
Others may completely zone out.
So be careful, okay?
translation:
How are you feeling since coming
to the Digital World?
Occasionally those who come here
will become over-excited,
Others may completely zone out.
So be careful, okay?

original:
If there's anything you want to 
know about this DigiBase,
Just ask Gatomon, who's over 
there by the moniter.
When it comes to Evoluton and
States, talk to Calumon.
Though he's currently busy
repairing the Evolution Tree.
But he's usually in Yggdrasil 
Room just next door,
So why don't you have a chat
with him when you return?
translation:
If there's anything you want to 
know about this DigiBase,
Just ask Gatomon, who's over 
there by the moniter.
When it comes to Evoluton and
States, talk to Calumon.
Though he's currently busy
repairing the Evolution Tree.
But he's usually in Yggdrasil 
Room just next door,
So why don't you have a chat
with him when you return?

original:
^P really is a Tamer!

It's been a long time since a Tamer
came here.
In the past, there were a lot of 
them around this area...
translation:
^P really is a Tamer!

It's been a long time since a Tamer
came here.
In the past, there were a lot of 
them around this area...

original:
The DigiBase is a place that 
supports a Tamer's activities.
The things necessary for raising
Digimon are all here.
What's more, if you lose in battle
against a Digimon...
You'll always return here safe
and sound♪
translation:
The DigiBase is a place that 
supports a Tamer's activities.
The things necessary for raising
Digimon are all here.
What's more, if you lose in battle
against a Digimon...
You'll always return here safe
and sound♪

original:
If you were a reliable Tamer, 
^P
The Digimon here would do anything
for you!
For a Tamer to support the 
Digital World...
In turn, the Tamer also supports
the Digimon in it!
You could call it a give-and-take
relationship.
translation:
If you were a reliable Tamer, 
^P
The Digimon here would do anything
for you!
For a Tamer to support the 
Digital World...
In turn, the Tamer also supports
the Digimon in it!
You could call it a give-and-take
relationship.

original:
Now the first thing we'd like you
to do, ^P...
...Is to find the DigiShip!

It should be in parts spread out
across Patch Prairie.
So could you get the addresses of
those parts' locations?
Don't worry, you won't have to
carry it all back.
translation:
Now the first thing we'd like you
to do, ^P...
...Is to find the DigiShip!

It should be in parts spread out
across Patch Prairie.
So could you get the addresses of
those parts' locations?
Don't worry, you won't have to
carry it all back.

original:
I'm Lopmon.
Nice to meet you, ^P!
translation:
I'm Lopmon.
Nice to meet you, ^P!

original:
Oh right! I'll teach you something
useful, ^P.
If you press the A button while 
standing next to the bed...
You can have your Digimon's
HP and MP restored!
And if you press the A button in
front of the PC beside me...
You'll be able to see your 
Quest List!
Though you might not have 
any Quests just yet...
translation:
Oh right! I'll teach you something
useful, ^P.
If you press the A button while 
standing next to the bed...
You can have your Digimon's
HP and MP restored!
And if you press the A button in
front of the PC beside me...
You'll be able to see your 
Quest List!
Though you might not have 
any Quests just yet...

original:
Hi there, I'm Patamon.

I'm an expert in maintaining the
DigiShip and DigiPort.
translation:
Hi there, I'm Patamon.

I'm an expert in maintaining the
DigiShip and DigiPort.

original:
Ah, sorry...!
You can't enter here yet.
The DigiPort will be usable, soon...

But the DigiShip is nowhere to be
seen...
translation:
Ah, sorry...!
You can't enter here yet.
The DigiPort will be usable, soon...

But the DigiShip is nowhere to be
seen...

original:
Hey, you there!

This is the Sukamon Army's
territory!
No one is allowed to pass!
Go play Tamer somewhere else!
translation:
Hey, you there!

This is the Sukamon Army's
territory!
No one is allowed to pass!
Go play Tamer somewhere else!

original:
...Wha?
A crashed DigiShip?
That ain't this way, you know.
It's over at Patch Prairie.
Just go straight from the DigiBase,
and a bit to the left.
How do I know that...?
It doesn't matter.
translation:
...Wha?
A crashed DigiShip?
That ain't this way, you know.
It's over at Patch Prairie.
Just go straight from the DigiBase,
and a bit to the left.
How do I know that...?
It doesn't matter.

original:
Are you the novice Tamer 
Terriermon's been talking about?
You're out searching for a
DigiShip...?
...Jeez, you brought back some
bad memories...
translation:
Are you the novice Tamer 
Terriermon's been talking about?
You're out searching for a
DigiShip...?
...Jeez, you brought back some
bad memories...

original:
A decent DigiShip doesn't exist,
anymore.
There's just one lying in pieces
over at Patch Prairie.
translation:
A decent DigiShip doesn't exist,
anymore.
There's just one lying in pieces
over at Patch Prairie.

original:
How dare you try and pass by us,
you newbie!
We, the Sukamon Army, will not
allow it!
translation:
How dare you try and pass by us,
you newbie!
We, the Sukamon Army, will not
allow it!

original:
You're looking for a crashed
DigiShip...?
T-t-that's not something the
Sukamon Army will allow...!
W-well, it's not like the ship's
in this direction, anyway...
If you're looking for it... why not
try over in Patch Prairie?
translation:
You're looking for a crashed
DigiShip...?
T-t-that's not something the
Sukamon Army will allow...!
W-well, it's not like the ship's
in this direction, anyway...
If you're looking for it... why not
try over in Patch Prairie?

original:
You can do Repairing over at the
DigiLab.
If you want to know more about
Repairing, just ask Renamon.
They'll teach you all about how to
set DigiPlates into the Tree.
So don't hesitate if you need to 
know anything!
translation:
You can do Repairing over at the
DigiLab.
If you want to know more about
Repairing, just ask Renamon.
They'll teach you all about how to
set DigiPlates into the Tree.
So don't hesitate if you need to 
know anything!

original:
This is kind of eerie...
After the Erasers appeared...
Tamers throughout the Digital
World began to disappear...
I really don't want to think about
it...
I wonder if they've been erased,
too...
translation:
This is kind of eerie...
After the Erasers appeared...
Tamers throughout the Digital
World began to disappear...
I really don't want to think about
it...
I wonder if they've been erased,
too...

original:
For now, I want you to find the
most important part of a DigiShip,
Which is called the Black Box.

I believe it may be somewhere over
in Packet Coast...
Exit the DigiBase and turn left...
From there, go straight,
Continue onwards for a while,
and you'll reach Packet Coast.
translation:
For now, I want you to find the
most important part of a DigiShip,
Which is called the Black Box.

I believe it may be somewhere over
in Packet Coast...
Exit the DigiBase and turn left...
From there, go straight,
Continue onwards for a while,
and you'll reach Packet Coast.

original:
Oh, ^P!
I've been waiting for you!
Please set Devimon's plate into
the Evolution Tree!
translation:
Oh, ^P!
I've been waiting for you!
Please set Devimon's plate into
the Evolution Tree!

original:
DemiDevimon still has the Black
Box...?
Then we have no choice but to get
him to hand it over...
Fortunately, Login Port is now open
so getting there should be a breeze.
You can just fly straight there!♪

But once you get there, the rest'll
be up to you, okay?
translation:
DemiDevimon still has the Black
Box...?
Then we have no choice but to get
him to hand it over...
Fortunately, Login Port is now open
so getting there should be a breeze.
You can just fly straight there!♪

But once you get there, the rest'll
be up to you, okay?

original:
A friend of mine is in trouble!
He's fighting the Bandits!
Hurry to Login Mountain and
help him out!
This might be your chance to
catch the Bandits, too!
translation:
A friend of mine is in trouble!
He's fighting the Bandits!
Hurry to Login Mountain and
help him out!
This might be your chance to
catch the Bandits, too!

original:
Hey, ^P,
did you check out the Quest PC?
It's just next to Lopmon, go stand
in front of the PC and press A!
In the Quest PC, you can see 
requests from various Digimon.
By completing those requests,
you'll make the Digimon very happy.
Your skills as a Tamer will also
increase♪
Once you accept a Quest, the
requester will be next to Calumon.
So if you want to check the
quest details, just at them.
You can check your quest
progress by opening the menu.
You can open the menu with
the Start or X buttons♪
translation:
Hey, ^P,
did you check out the Quest PC?
It's just next to Lopmon, go stand
in front of the PC and press A!
In the Quest PC, you can see 
requests from various Digimon.
By completing those requests,
you'll make the Digimon very happy.
Your skills as a Tamer will also
increase♪
Once you accept a Quest, the
requester will be next to Calumon.
So if you want to check the
quest details, just at them.
You can check your quest
progress by opening the menu.
You can open the menu with
the Start or X buttons♪

original:
After the Selectors appeared,
Tamers started disappearing...
The population of Digimon has 
also decreased significantly.
Where has everyone gone...?
translation:
After the Selectors appeared,
Tamers started disappearing...
The population of Digimon has 
also decreased significantly.
Where has everyone gone...?

original:
Oh, about our current location...

We're on an island called the 
Motherboard Continent.
We're currently on the northern 
half, called North Bridge.
The southern half is known as
South Bridge.
There's one more island, and 
the two were originally fused.
However, many years ago, a 
mysterious earthquake occured.
It split the two continents apart.

While we now call it Graphics 
Board Continent...
Really, both are from the 
same 'root' continent.
translation:
Oh, about our current location...

We're on an island called the 
Motherboard Continent.
We're currently on the northern 
half, called North Bridge.
The southern half is known as
South Bridge.
There's one more island, and 
the two were originally fused.
However, many years ago, a 
mysterious earthquake occured.
It split the two continents apart.

While we now call it Graphics 
Board Continent...
Really, both are from the 
same 'root' continent.

original:
Oh, ^P,
how have you been?
The repairs on our end have been
going smoothly!
Haha... we sure are busy!
translation:
Oh, ^P,
how have you been?
The repairs on our end have been
going smoothly!
Haha... we sure are busy!

original:
You just focus on your job as
a Tamer, ^P!
Leave the DigiBase to me!
translation:
You just focus on your job as
a Tamer, ^P!
Leave the DigiBase to me!

original:
Not only can you purchase HP and
MP restoration items,
But also Weapons, Armor, and 
other consumable items!
Isn't it great?

But before you go buying
anything...
You should do some Repairing!
translation:
Not only can you purchase HP and
MP restoration items,
But also Weapons, Armor, and 
other consumable items!
Isn't it great?

But before you go buying
anything...
You should do some Repairing!

original:
Welcome to the Item Shop!
Are you short on anything?
translation:
Welcome to the Item Shop!
Are you short on anything?

original:
You're currently in the North
Bridge DigiBase!
If you get lost, it'd be troublesome
for all of us, so listen up!
The northern half of the continent
is called North Bridge,
While the southern half is known as
South Bridge.
There's one more island, and 
the two were originally fused.
However, many years ago, a 
mysterious earthquake occured.
It split the two continents apart.

While we now call it Graphics 
Board Continent...
Really, both are from the 
same 'root' continent.
translation:
You're currently in the North
Bridge DigiBase!
If you get lost, it'd be troublesome
for all of us, so listen up!
The northern half of the continent
is called North Bridge,
While the southern half is known as
South Bridge.
There's one more island, and 
the two were originally fused.
However, many years ago, a 
mysterious earthquake occured.
It split the two continents apart.

While we now call it Graphics 
Board Continent...
Really, both are from the 
same 'root' continent.

original:
Hey, ^P...

Did you check the Quest PC
already?
Digimon ask Tamers to help them
out with various requests,
So be sure to listen and help them
out, okay?
translation:
Hey, ^P...

Did you check the Quest PC
already?
Digimon ask Tamers to help them
out with various requests,
So be sure to listen and help them
out, okay?

original:
The PC will show different quests
available from various Digimon.
It's the Tamer's role to fufill these
quests, don't you think?
If you chip away at these quests,
the Digimon will be pleased.
Plus they'll become more likely
to lend you their strength.♪
translation:
The PC will show different quests
available from various Digimon.
It's the Tamer's role to fufill these
quests, don't you think?
If you chip away at these quests,
the Digimon will be pleased.
Plus they'll become more likely
to lend you their strength.♪

original:
The DigiPort will be fixed soon.
Please wait a bit longer.
translation:
The DigiPort will be fixed soon.
Please wait a bit longer.

original:
It'll be great once the DigiPort
is repaired, won't it?
Soon you'll be able to use the
DigiShip!♪
translation:
It'll be great once the DigiPort
is repaired, won't it?
Soon you'll be able to use the
DigiShip!♪

original:
I'm Biyomon, I came here together
with Pandamon.
You're a Tamer, right,
^P?
You know all the Digimon are 
already talking about you?
They seem to think you're
quite the Tamer, ^P.♪
translation:
I'm Biyomon, I came here together
with Pandamon.
You're a Tamer, right,
^P?
You know all the Digimon are 
already talking about you?
They seem to think you're
quite the Tamer, ^P.♪

original:
It's been a very long time since
the Tamers disappeared...
The Digimon are very troubled
over this...
You're a Tamer, right?
Maybe you can help us...
We aren't that strong, and maybe
you don't trust us...
But we should be fine with you...
Right?
translation:
It's been a very long time since
the Tamers disappeared...
The Digimon are very troubled
over this...
You're a Tamer, right?
Maybe you can help us...
We aren't that strong, and maybe
you don't trust us...
But we should be fine with you...
Right?

original:
Did you check the Quest PC in
the Private Room?
It's just beside Lopmon.

When you accept a quest, the
requester will come to the Base.
You should try to hear out 
everyone's requests.
That's what everyone's hoping
for... okay?
translation:
Did you check the Quest PC in
the Private Room?
It's just beside Lopmon.

When you accept a quest, the
requester will come to the Base.
You should try to hear out 
everyone's requests.
That's what everyone's hoping
for... okay?

original:
When you talk with a Digimon 
who's made a request...
A Quest Marker will appear 
indicating the area you need to go.
Getting off at a nearby Port to
the area is a good shortcut, but...
If the DigiPort isn't open, then 
you won't be able to travel there.
So sometimes you'll just have
to walk.
translation:
When you talk with a Digimon 
who's made a request...
A Quest Marker will appear 
indicating the area you need to go.
Getting off at a nearby Port to
the area is a good shortcut, but...
If the DigiPort isn't open, then 
you won't be able to travel there.
So sometimes you'll just have
to walk.

original:
Do you know about the fountain
and hole at North Bridge?
The hole connects to an
underground path called North Cave
And the fountain connects to an
underwater path called North Marine.
North Cave leads to Magnet Mine.
And North Marine leads to 
Loop Swamp.♪
translation:
Do you know about the fountain
and hole at North Bridge?
The hole connects to an
underground path called North Cave
And the fountain connects to an
underwater path called North Marine.
North Cave leads to Magnet Mine.
And North Marine leads to 
Loop Swamp.♪

original:
Incidentally, about the hole you need
to enter to get to North Cave...
It's located deep inside Login
Mountain.
And as for the fountain you need to
enter North Marine...
It's on the beach at Packet Coast.

Why don't you go check them out?
translation:
Incidentally, about the hole you need
to enter to get to North Cave...
It's located deep inside Login
Mountain.
And as for the fountain you need to
enter North Marine...
It's on the beach at Packet Coast.

Why don't you go check them out?

original:
Oh, you can travel to South Bridge
now?
In that case, I'll give you an 
important piece of advice.
Near the DigiPort at Register
Jungle...
There's a large hole that leads
down to South Cave.
translation:
Oh, you can travel to South Bridge
now?
In that case, I'll give you an 
important piece of advice.
Near the DigiPort at Register
Jungle...
There's a large hole that leads
down to South Cave.

original:
If you head into South Cave...

You can reach Pixel Desert, as
well as Shadow Hell.
Once in the passage, go right to
enter Shadow Hell,
And if you head straight, you 
should arrive at Pixel Desert.♪
translation:
If you head into South Cave...

You can reach Pixel Desert, as
well as Shadow Hell.
Once in the passage, go right to
enter Shadow Hell,
And if you head straight, you 
should arrive at Pixel Desert.♪

original:
You can reach Graphics Board
now? Then get this...
Near the Switch Gate in Task 
Canyon...
There's a large hole that leads to
Graphics Board Cave.
You can reach Wizard Temple by
going through that cave.
There are some other large holes,
but...
I'm sorry, I can't remember any
details about them...
translation:
You can reach Graphics Board
now? Then get this...
Near the Switch Gate in Task 
Canyon...
There's a large hole that leads to
Graphics Board Cave.
You can reach Wizard Temple by
going through that cave.
There are some other large holes,
but...
I'm sorry, I can't remember any
details about them...

original:
On the other side of Access 
Glacier, at Access Port North,
There's a fountain that leads to
a path called Graphics Board Marina
That path will then take you to
Angler Tunnel.
I know there are a lot of fountains
in that area...
But if you spot one, why not just
try jumping in?
translation:
On the other side of Access 
Glacier, at Access Port North,
There's a fountain that leads to
a path called Graphics Board Marina
That path will then take you to
Angler Tunnel.
I know there are a lot of fountains
in that area...
But if you spot one, why not just
try jumping in?

original:
１２０３　２０５７　３９０９４
３４３９９　９６４　４９５０…
...Hm?
...Why isn't this enough?
H-hey, don't talk to me right now!
translation:
１２０３　２０５７　３９０９４
３４３９９　９６４　４９５０…
...Hm?
...Why isn't this enough?
H-hey, don't talk to me right now!

original:
The DigiShip can't travel very
far right now.
You can't reach South Bridge using
it just yet.
translation:
The DigiShip can't travel very
far right now.
You can't reach South Bridge using
it just yet.

original:
Did you hear the details about 
the DigiShip?
If you know a specific address
between two DigiPorts...
You can dock the DigiShip
at that address.
However you can't dock at ports
you don't know the location of,
nor ports that are still unlocked.
Be sure to unlock many ports!
translation:
Did you hear the details about 
the DigiShip?
If you know a specific address
between two DigiPorts...
You can dock the DigiShip
at that address.
However you can't dock at ports
you don't know the location of,
nor ports that are still unlocked.
Be sure to unlock many ports!

original:
^P! Thank you for delivering
Agumon's boxed lunch!
I'm going to take a page from your
book and help others more.
Thanks again, ^P!
translation:
^P! Thank you for delivering
Agumon's boxed lunch!
I'm going to take a page from your
book and help others more.
Thanks again, ^P!

original:
Are you used to the DigiBase yet?
Because I'm sure not!
translation:
Are you used to the DigiBase yet?
Because I'm sure not!

original:
First you should get to know
everyone in the DigiBase...
translation:
First you should get to know
everyone in the DigiBase...

original:
Oh, ^P!
We meet again!
Have you been using the Farm
Goods I gave you?
I'm always here, so just ask if
you need anything!
translation:
Oh, ^P!
We meet again!
Have you been using the Farm
Goods I gave you?
I'm always here, so just ask if
you need anything!

original:
I'm getting new Farm Goods all
the time!
translation:
I'm getting new Farm Goods all
the time!

original:
My fashionable advice...
Come hear it more often, got that?
translation:
My fashionable advice...
Come hear it more often, got that?

original:
Oh, ^P,
did you find Hiroyuki?
If you don't know the way to
South Bridge...
You can always ask Armadillomon
over at Login Mountain.
translation:
Oh, ^P,
did you find Hiroyuki?
If you don't know the way to
South Bridge...
You can always ask Armadillomon
over at Login Mountain.

original:
Not only have you not found Hiroyuki
but you lost Asuka as well?!
Hmm... Mmm...
This is bad...
translation:
Not only have you not found Hiroyuki
but you lost Asuka as well?!
Hmm... Mmm...
This is bad...

original:
In any case, thank goodness you
found Hiroyuki!
Now you've just gotta hurry and
find Asuka...
translation:
In any case, thank goodness you
found Hiroyuki!
Now you've just gotta hurry and
find Asuka...

original:
Kernel...
...Kernel...?
I've heard that name before...
But where...
translation:
Kernel...
...Kernel...?
I've heard that name before...
But where...

original:
Oh, ^P, you're looking
for Hiroyuki right now, yeah?
Have you asked about how to get
there from Armadillomon?
You should be able to find her over
at Login Mountain.
translation:
Oh, ^P, you're looking
for Hiroyuki right now, yeah?
Have you asked about how to get
there from Armadillomon?
You should be able to find her over
at Login Mountain.

original:
What?!
Asuka's gone, too, now?!
How? By whom?
Where did they go?!
I see... You don't have a clue,
either...
translation:
What?!
Asuka's gone, too, now?!
How? By whom?
Where did they go?!
I see... You don't have a clue,
either...

original:
Oh, you found Hiroyuki!

But now the issue lies with 
Asuka...
I... I haven't come up with any
plan yet...
I was hoping that maybe...
instead you'd have... you know??
translation:
Oh, you found Hiroyuki!

But now the issue lies with 
Asuka...
I... I haven't come up with any
plan yet...
I was hoping that maybe...
instead you'd have... you know??

original:
A New Tamer Union?
Such a thing exists?
So I guess you're the leader,
^P?
I see...
translation:
A New Tamer Union?
Such a thing exists?
So I guess you're the leader,
^P?
I see...

original:
You look tired,
why don't you take a break?
You can restore your HP and MP
using the bed over there.
translation:
You look tired,
why don't you take a break?
You can restore your HP and MP
using the bed over there.

original:
This time Asuka's the one that's
gone missing?!
I understand you're worried, but
try not to overdo it, okay?
translation:
This time Asuka's the one that's
gone missing?!
I understand you're worried, but
try not to overdo it, okay?

original:
Hiroyuki's back? That's great!
You did great, ^P!
You just need to focus on finding
one person at a time!
I know you can do it, ^P♪
translation:
Hiroyuki's back? That's great!
You did great, ^P!
You just need to focus on finding
one person at a time!
I know you can do it, ^P♪

original:
I heard you found both Asuka and
Takuto, is that true?
They were acting weird? But they 
were Asuka and Takuto, right?
They ran away, so you don't know,
huh...?
Wait... why'd they run away??
translation:
I heard you found both Asuka and
Takuto, is that true?
They were acting weird? But they 
were Asuka and Takuto, right?
They ran away, so you don't know,
huh...?
Wait... why'd they run away??

original:
Have you found Hiroyuki, yet?
No?
If you go to South Bridge, you
might figure something out.
Go ask Armadillomon over at
Login Mountain for directions.
translation:
Have you found Hiroyuki, yet?
No?
If you go to South Bridge, you
might figure something out.
Go ask Armadillomon over at
Login Mountain for directions.

original:
Welcome back, ^P♪

Seems you've managed to make it
to South Bridge, huh?
.........
Wait, where's Asuka?
translation:
Welcome back, ^P♪

Seems you've managed to make it
to South Bridge, huh?
.........
Wait, where's Asuka?

original:
You found Hiroyuki?
Wow, great job!♪
I knew you could do it!
translation:
You found Hiroyuki?
Wow, great job!♪
I knew you could do it!

original:
Your next destination is Graphics
Board Continent, huh?
I'll be sure to keep the DigiShip in
top condition for you!
translation:
Your next destination is Graphics
Board Continent, huh?
I'll be sure to keep the DigiShip in
top condition for you!

original:
The DigiShip sure is convenient,
I want to ride next time!
translation:
The DigiShip sure is convenient,
I want to ride next time!

original:
^P! Great to see you again!

You really are strong, gathering all 
those Courage Pieces like that!
I've become a fan of yours,
^P!
I'll be supporting you from now on!
translation:
^P! Great to see you again!

You really are strong, gathering all 
those Courage Pieces like that!
I've become a fan of yours,
^P!
I'll be supporting you from now on!

original:
Digimon in the Farm Island will also
give you quests, you know!
translation:
Digimon in the Farm Island will also
give you quests, you know!

original:
H-hi there, ^P...

I-I finally mustered up the courage
to come out of the water...
I-I will work hard to be just like
you, ^P...
That's why... I want to thank you!
translation:
H-hi there, ^P...

I-I finally mustered up the courage
to come out of the water...
I-I will work hard to be just like
you, ^P...
That's why... I want to thank you!

original:
My next goal...
Is to clear a quest, I guess...
translation:
My next goal...
Is to clear a quest, I guess...

original:
Hey! You!
I'm the incredible Kenkimon!
Did you enjoy the taste of that
Lava Juice!?
I think I'm gonna wander around
the cape, now!
Hahaaah! See you around!
translation:
Hey! You!
I'm the incredible Kenkimon!
Did you enjoy the taste of that
Lava Juice!?
I think I'm gonna wander around
the cape, now!
Hahaaah! See you around!

original:
Hahaaah!
Are you making use of DigiPorts?
translation:
Hahaaah!
Are you making use of DigiPorts?

original:
Everyone's asking you for help?
I'd like to do that, too...
translation:
Everyone's asking you for help?
I'd like to do that, too...

original:
Whoa, ^P!

This Golden Apple is so delicious it
feels like my teeth'll break!
I'd better head to a dentist!

See you around!
translation:
Whoa, ^P!

This Golden Apple is so delicious it
feels like my teeth'll break!
I'd better head to a dentist!

See you around!

original:
Did you check out the shop?
They sell lots of cool stuff!
translation:
Did you check out the shop?
They sell lots of cool stuff!

original:
I was so surprised when I heard
you'd found Hiroyuki.
While he brought along a Digivice
and a DigiShip,
He had no clue how to use the 
Digivice he brought.
He also had no Digimon, and didn't 
know how to pilot the DigiShip.
He was completely clueless.
translation:
I was so surprised when I heard
you'd found Hiroyuki.
While he brought along a Digivice
and a DigiShip,
He had no clue how to use the 
Digivice he brought.
He also had no Digimon, and didn't 
know how to pilot the DigiShip.
He was completely clueless.

original:
When Hiroyuki stepped off the 
DigiShip, 
He must have pressed some 
button at random.
The ship went flying off on its own
to who knows where.
...What? The ship returned to the
DigiBase?
But all the data was wiped...?
No addresses or logs, nothing??
………

Just what on earth did Hiroyuki
meddle with...?
translation:
When Hiroyuki stepped off the 
DigiShip, 
He must have pressed some 
button at random.
The ship went flying off on its own
to who knows where.
...What? The ship returned to the
DigiBase?
But all the data was wiped...?
No addresses or logs, nothing??
………

Just what on earth did Hiroyuki
meddle with...?

original:
Limit Valley...?

You can get there via the exit
on the DigiPort side.
In that direction is a place called
Register Jungle.
It's a dangerous place, but I'm 
sure you'll be fine, ^P.
But all the same, keep an eye
on Hiroyuki, got it?
translation:
Limit Valley...?

You can get there via the exit
on the DigiPort side.
In that direction is a place called
Register Jungle.
It's a dangerous place, but I'm 
sure you'll be fine, ^P.
But all the same, keep an eye
on Hiroyuki, got it?

original:
I was so surprised when I heard
you'd found Hiroyuki!
While he brought along a Digivice
and a DigiShip,
He had no clue how to use the 
Digivice he brought with him...
He also had no Digimon, and didn't 
know how to pilot the DigiShip.
He was completely clueless...
translation:
I was so surprised when I heard
you'd found Hiroyuki!
While he brought along a Digivice
and a DigiShip,
He had no clue how to use the 
Digivice he brought with him...
He also had no Digimon, and didn't 
know how to pilot the DigiShip.
He was completely clueless...

original:
When Hiroyuki stepped off the 
DigiShip, 
He must have pressed some 
button without thinking...
The ship went flying off on its own
somewhere...
...What's that? The ship returned 
to the DigiBase??
But all the data was wiped...?
No addresses or logs, nothing??
………

Just what on earth did Hiroyuki
mess with...?
translation:
When Hiroyuki stepped off the 
DigiShip, 
He must have pressed some 
button without thinking...
The ship went flying off on its own
somewhere...
...What's that? The ship returned 
to the DigiBase??
But all the data was wiped...?
No addresses or logs, nothing??
………

Just what on earth did Hiroyuki
mess with...?

original:
Limit Valley...?

You can get there via the exit
on the DigiPort side.
In that direction is a place called
Register Jungle...
It's a dangerous place, but I'm 
sure you'll be fine, ^P.
But all the same, keep an eye
on Hiroyuki, okay?
translation:
Limit Valley...?

You can get there via the exit
on the DigiPort side.
In that direction is a place called
Register Jungle...
It's a dangerous place, but I'm 
sure you'll be fine, ^P.
But all the same, keep an eye
on Hiroyuki, okay?

original:
Hey, are you a friend of Hiroyuki's?

He sure is an interesting fellow,
though a bit loud...
translation:
Hey, are you a friend of Hiroyuki's?

He sure is an interesting fellow,
though a bit loud...

original:
He's in the private room just up
ahead.
He's got a lotta free time on his
hands, so hurry over to him.
translation:
He's in the private room just up
ahead.
He's got a lotta free time on his
hands, so hurry over to him.

original:
I'm so relieved you brought 
Hiroyuki back unharmed!
It's probably a good idea for him to
give up on becoming a Tamer.
He was lucky this time...

But he might not be so lucky in
the future...
translation:
I'm so relieved you brought 
Hiroyuki back unharmed!
It's probably a good idea for him to
give up on becoming a Tamer.
He was lucky this time...

But he might not be so lucky in
the future...

original:
Oh, you're a Tamer?
A rare sight, these days...
Everyone here in Tamer Town
used to be Tamers.
That is, until the Selectors came 
and stole all our Digivices.
translation:
Oh, you're a Tamer?
A rare sight, these days...
Everyone here in Tamer Town
used to be Tamers.
That is, until the Selectors came 
and stole all our Digivices.

original:
There used to be a fair number
of Tamers here.
However there's only a single
Rookie Tamer left now.
You're curious as to what 
happened to the other Tamers?
I'm pretty sure they left to join
the remaining Tamer Union.
It seems they left to help fight
off the Selectors.
Last I heard, they were headed 
to Palace Laboratory.
translation:
There used to be a fair number
of Tamers here.
However there's only a single
Rookie Tamer left now.
You're curious as to what 
happened to the other Tamers?
I'm pretty sure they left to join
the remaining Tamer Union.
It seems they left to help fight
off the Selectors.
Last I heard, they were headed 
to Palace Laboratory.

original:
...Hm?

If you're going to Limit Valley,
it's not that way, you know?
There's another exit close to the
DigiPort.
That exit connects to Register
Jungle.
And if you continue forward,
you'll end up in Limit Valley.
However, it'll be impossible to
pass unless you're a Tamer.
translation:
...Hm?

If you're going to Limit Valley,
it's not that way, you know?
There's another exit close to the
DigiPort.
That exit connects to Register
Jungle.
And if you continue forward,
you'll end up in Limit Valley.
However, it'll be impossible to
pass unless you're a Tamer.

original:
Here you can get a taste of my
iron-clad defence.
translation:
Here you can get a taste of my
iron-clad defence.

original:
Won't you tell me some secret
passwords?
translation:
Won't you tell me some secret
passwords?

original:
You're a friend of Hiroyuki's,
right?
I'm so glad you're finally coming
to pick him up!
That kid's been super fidgety ever
since he arrived here.
Going on and on 'I hope my lost 
friends find their way here...!'
In the end, he's the one who 
got lost, isn't he?
translation:
You're a friend of Hiroyuki's,
right?
I'm so glad you're finally coming
to pick him up!
That kid's been super fidgety ever
since he arrived here.
Going on and on 'I hope my lost 
friends find their way here...!'
In the end, he's the one who 
got lost, isn't he?

original:
You're Hiroyuki's friend, right?

I'm glad you two were able to
reunite without issue.
...What's that?
You want to go to Limit Valley?
In that case, you can get there
via the nearby exit.
Once you leave Tamer Town,
you'll be in Register Jungle.
Just beyond there you'll reach
Limit Valley.
And beyond that is Palace 
Laboratory...
But no one who gets that far
ends up returning...
translation:
You're Hiroyuki's friend, right?

I'm glad you two were able to
reunite without issue.
...What's that?
You want to go to Limit Valley?
In that case, you can get there
via the nearby exit.
Once you leave Tamer Town,
you'll be in Register Jungle.
Just beyond there you'll reach
Limit Valley.
And beyond that is Palace 
Laboratory...
But no one who gets that far
ends up returning...

original:
If you're looking for Hiroyuki,
he isn't around here!
Go back to where you started and
then turn right instead.
He's just been sitting around bored
so hurry and go see him already.
translation:
If you're looking for Hiroyuki,
he isn't around here!
Go back to where you started and
then turn right instead.
He's just been sitting around bored
so hurry and go see him already.

original:
You're looking for Hiroyuki?
Then you must be ^P.
I heard rumors about you!
I'm glad I was able to meet you♪
Though I heard you are currently
in a bit of a hurry so...
Once things calm down, please 
come back and hang out sometime.
translation:
You're looking for Hiroyuki?
Then you must be ^P.
I heard rumors about you!
I'm glad I was able to meet you♪
Though I heard you are currently
in a bit of a hurry so...
Once things calm down, please 
come back and hang out sometime.

original:
Has your DigiFarm gotten bigger?

If you want to raise good Digimon,
first you'll need a good DigiFarm!
translation:
Has your DigiFarm gotten bigger?

If you want to raise good Digimon,
first you'll need a good DigiFarm!

original:
This is the Farm Shop!
Do you see anything you need?
translation:
This is the Farm Shop!
Do you see anything you need?

original:
Anytime you need anything,
I'll be here for you!
I am the Item Shop Digimon and
an ally of justice!
The name's Pandamon!
translation:
Anytime you need anything,
I'll be here for you!
I am the Item Shop Digimon and
an ally of justice!
The name's Pandamon!

original:
Welcome to the Item Shop!
Do you need anything?
translation:
Welcome to the Item Shop!
Do you need anything?

original:
So you've finally come.
I am Wisemon.
I am the Digimon who acts as a link
between this world and others.
translation:
So you've finally come.
I am Wisemon.
I am the Digimon who acts as a link
between this world and others.

original:
This is the Communication Counter.

You can use this place for all
your communication needs.
translation:
This is the Communication Counter.

You can use this place for all
your communication needs.

original:
Don't tell me you've already 
forgotten about repairing?
Repairing is how you will fix 
this world!
The world needs you, 
and you need tools!
translation:
Don't tell me you've already 
forgotten about repairing?
Repairing is how you will fix 
this world!
The world needs you, 
and you need tools!

original:
This is the Repair Tool Shop!
Do you see anything you need?
translation:
This is the Repair Tool Shop!
Do you see anything you need?

original:
This is the Repair Tool Shop!
Do you see anything you need?
How about this new product?
A Tera Hammer!
It can shatter Crystal Bugs into
a million pieces!
translation:
This is the Repair Tool Shop!
Do you see anything you need?
How about this new product?
A Tera Hammer!
It can shatter Crystal Bugs into
a million pieces!

original:
Hey, ^P!
Thanks for before!
I was mistaken, I was always cool
even without the DigiStone.
I'm really grateful to you for
showing me that, ^P.
I'll be sure to follow in your 
footsteps from now on!
translation:
Hey, ^P!
Thanks for before!
I was mistaken, I was always cool
even without the DigiStone.
I'm really grateful to you for
showing me that, ^P.
I'll be sure to follow in your 
footsteps from now on!

original:
Here's some advice!
Always go with what's flashier!
translation:
Here's some advice!
Always go with what's flashier!

original:
Oh, ^P,
you've come!
This is the best place for me to
keep up my diet!
I'll be continuing my training for a
while, so see you later!
translation:
Oh, ^P,
you've come!
This is the best place for me to
keep up my diet!
I'll be continuing my training for a
while, so see you later!

original:
When it comes to a diet, first you
need to make sure it's balanced.
translation:
When it comes to a diet, first you
need to make sure it's balanced.

original:
Sorry, ^P... I couldn't wait
so I came here ahead of you...
I thought I'd do some training
before the big match...
If you ever want to meet me, 
I tend to hang out here in general...
translation:
Sorry, ^P... I couldn't wait
so I came here ahead of you...
I thought I'd do some training
before the big match...
If you ever want to meet me, 
I tend to hang out here in general...

original:
The world is getting more and more
lively...
translation:
The world is getting more and more
lively...

original:
Oh! ^P!
Have you been digging holes?
Hm? You want to go to South
Bridge?
I see... hmmm...

I know! Theres a large hole over
in Chip Forest!
If you go through that, I'm sure
you'll make it to South Bridge!
translation:
Oh! ^P!
Have you been digging holes?
Hm? You want to go to South
Bridge?
I see... hmmm...

I know! Theres a large hole over
in Chip Forest!
If you go through that, I'm sure
you'll make it to South Bridge!

original:
What do you think of Graphics
Board Continent?
You haven't met with any trouble,
have you?
Though I'm sure you'd be fine if
you did, ^P...
Just be careful, okay?
translation:
What do you think of Graphics
Board Continent?
You haven't met with any trouble,
have you?
Though I'm sure you'd be fine if
you did, ^P...
Just be careful, okay?

original:
I'm so relieved we managed to
find Asuka unharmed...
But something weird happened over
on Graphics Board Continent, huh?
If you weren't there, ^P,
things may not have worked out...
translation:
I'm so relieved we managed to
find Asuka unharmed...
But something weird happened over
on Graphics Board Continent, huh?
If you weren't there, ^P,
things may not have worked out...

original:
So the Champions of South City
were the Bandits...
And they managed to help the 
Numemon escape the Selectors?
But aren't the Bandits the minions
of the Selectors...?
Hmmm...
I just don't get it...
translation:
So the Champions of South City
were the Bandits...
And they managed to help the 
Numemon escape the Selectors?
But aren't the Bandits the minions
of the Selectors...?
Hmmm...
I just don't get it...

original:
BanchoLeomon?
Yeah, I've heard that name before.
It's that noisy Digimon that's 
looking for his Tamer, right?
He's the type who's always 
raising the tension around him.
I hear when he returns home, he's
so tense, he tears at his mane.
What? He found his Partner?
That's great!
translation:
BanchoLeomon?
Yeah, I've heard that name before.
It's that noisy Digimon that's 
looking for his Tamer, right?
He's the type who's always 
raising the tension around him.
I hear when he returns home, he's
so tense, he tears at his mane.
What? He found his Partner?
That's great!

original:
Hiroyuki... Asuka...
Yui... Takuto...
You're all back!
And it's thanks to ^P♪
Not to mention you found
DemiDevimon and BanchoLeomon!
If anyone else gets lost, we know
we can count on you, ^P!
translation:
Hiroyuki... Asuka...
Yui... Takuto...
You're all back!
And it's thanks to ^P♪
Not to mention you found
DemiDevimon and BanchoLeomon!
If anyone else gets lost, we know
we can count on you, ^P!

original:
Hey, the DigiColosseum really looks
incredible, doesn't it?
Though I've only seen it through
 a monitor and not for myself...
Many Digimon long to go there!
translation:
Hey, the DigiColosseum really looks
incredible, doesn't it?
Though I've only seen it through
 a monitor and not for myself...
Many Digimon long to go there!

original:
So you're a Bronze Tamer now,
^P...
This is just the beginning. Now you
can work your way up the ranks♪
translation:
So you're a Bronze Tamer now,
^P...
This is just the beginning. Now you
can work your way up the ranks♪

original:
I think Silver fits you better than
Bronze, ^P.
But Gold would suit you even
more!♪
translation:
I think Silver fits you better than
Bronze, ^P.
But Gold would suit you even
more!♪

original:
Congratulations on becoming a
Gold Tamer!♪
But when I think about your 
abilities...
I think becoming a Gold Tamer was
a given, ^P.
translation:
Congratulations on becoming a
Gold Tamer!♪
But when I think about your 
abilities...
I think becoming a Gold Tamer was
a given, ^P.

original:
I know everyone's been bothering
you to help them, ^P.
But we don't have anyone else
we can rely on, haha!
Joking aside, really, there isn't
anyone else besides you.
translation:
I know everyone's been bothering
you to help them, ^P.
But we don't have anyone else
we can rely on, haha!
Joking aside, really, there isn't
anyone else besides you.

original:
It'd be great if you could find
Asuka and the others soon...
Graphics Board Continent is a
whole different server to this one.
We don't have any allies over there
that we can rely on...
Plus Digivice signals have trouble
getting through...
Sorry, but you're the only one
we can ask to do this, ^P.
translation:
It'd be great if you could find
Asuka and the others soon...
Graphics Board Continent is a
whole different server to this one.
We don't have any allies over there
that we can rely on...
Plus Digivice signals have trouble
getting through...
Sorry, but you're the only one
we can ask to do this, ^P.

original:
Asuka was East City's Local
Champion?
You mean she's the strongest 
Tamer in Graphics Board East??
I guess it's no surprise considering
how determined she can be...
translation:
Asuka was East City's Local
Champion?
You mean she's the strongest 
Tamer in Graphics Board East??
I guess it's no surprise considering
how determined she can be...

original:
The Local Champions of South 
City are the Bandits...?
But isn't the new Tamer Union
on Graphics Board Continent...
Wasn't it assembled in order to
fight against the Selectors...?
......
Did something happen...?
translation:
The Local Champions of South 
City are the Bandits...?
But isn't the new Tamer Union
on Graphics Board Continent...
Wasn't it assembled in order to
fight against the Selectors...?
......
Did something happen...?

original:
So the Tamer you fought over in
West City...
Was one of the Tamers who'd left
Tamer Town?
In that case there may be other
Tamers on Graphics Board...
If that's true, it'd be great news.
translation:
So the Tamer you fought over in
West City...
Was one of the Tamers who'd left
Tamer Town?
In that case there may be other
Tamers on Graphics Board...
If that's true, it'd be great news.

original:
Everyone here is so relieved!

And it's all because you're here,
^P♪
translation:
Everyone here is so relieved!

And it's all because you're here,
^P♪

original:
Now it's time to show everyone
what you're made of!♪
Oh, you've already registered 
yourself into the Championship?
Hmmm... Sounds fun!
Good luck, ^P!
translation:
Now it's time to show everyone
what you're made of!♪
Oh, you've already registered 
yourself into the Championship?
Hmmm... Sounds fun!
Good luck, ^P!

original:
Congratulations on becoming a
Bronze Tamer!♪
So, ^P...

Are you used to all the duties that 
come with being a Tamer?
translation:
Congratulations on becoming a
Bronze Tamer!♪
So, ^P...

Are you used to all the duties that 
come with being a Tamer?

original:
You've become a Silver Tamer?
That's great!
I can clearly see that you're a
veteran Tamer, ^P!
translation:
You've become a Silver Tamer?
That's great!
I can clearly see that you're a
veteran Tamer, ^P!

original:
You've made it to Gold Tamer?
Unbelieveable!
Only few Tamers ever make it to
Gold Rank, you know?
There aren't many out there right
now, so you look even cooler!
translation:
You've made it to Gold Tamer?
Unbelieveable!
Only few Tamers ever make it to
Gold Rank, you know?
There aren't many out there right
now, so you look even cooler!

original:
Now's not the time for praise on
becoming a Platinum Tamer...
But you're our most dependable
Tamer, ^P.
I'm sure that you can do it...

I know you can save the Tamers
who've been taken by the Selectors!
translation:
Now's not the time for praise on
becoming a Platinum Tamer...
But you're our most dependable
Tamer, ^P.
I'm sure that you can do it...

I know you can save the Tamers
who've been taken by the Selectors!

original:
I had no idea Asuka had gone
missing too...
If I had known, I wouldn't have 
been wasting time here...
......Maybe...

But the Ship was gone, and I had
no way of returning, so...
translation:
I had no idea Asuka had gone
missing too...
If I had known, I wouldn't have 
been wasting time here...
......Maybe...

But the Ship was gone, and I had
no way of returning, so...

original:
I'm glad both you and Asuka
returned back safely!
You know everyone's been 
worried this whole time.
Though you may not believe me
when I say that...
translation:
I'm glad both you and Asuka
returned back safely!
You know everyone's been 
worried this whole time.
Though you may not believe me
when I say that...

original:
The Local Champion of South
City is Tres?
What are the Bandits doing on
Graphics Board Continent?
But they were originally calling
themselves part of the Selectors.
Maybe they got fired...?
translation:
The Local Champion of South
City is Tres?
What are the Bandits doing on
Graphics Board Continent?
But they were originally calling
themselves part of the Selectors.
Maybe they got fired...?

original:
So the Local Champion of West
City is Ace?
He's that hot shot Tamer from
Tamer Town, isn't he?
So... was he cool?
What? He was some hermit??
That's disappointing...
translation:
So the Local Champion of West
City is Ace?
He's that hot shot Tamer from
Tamer Town, isn't he?
So... was he cool?
What? He was some hermit??
That's disappointing...

original:
Thank you for saving Yui and
Takuto, ^P.
Not to mention saving me and
Asuka. We really are grateful.
Let's do it again, sometime♪

...That was a joke. We don't want
to cause you trouble again.
translation:
Thank you for saving Yui and
Takuto, ^P.
Not to mention saving me and
Asuka. We really are grateful.
Let's do it again, sometime♪

...That was a joke. We don't want
to cause you trouble again.

original:
Hm? Weren't you off to the 
DigiColosseum?
Did you forget something?
translation:
Hm? Weren't you off to the 
DigiColosseum?
Did you forget something?

original:
Hey, ^P!
Congrats on the Bronze Rank!
Must be nice...
I wish I was as cool as you...!
translation:
Hey, ^P!
Congrats on the Bronze Rank!
Must be nice...
I wish I was as cool as you...!

original:
You did it, ^P!
You're a Silver Tamer!
To compare to sushi, you'd be a
high-grade Konoshiro Shad!
Hm? You don't get it?
Me neither, to be honest!
translation:
You did it, ^P!
You're a Silver Tamer!
To compare to sushi, you'd be a
high-grade Konoshiro Shad!
Hm? You don't get it?
Me neither, to be honest!

original:
Whoa! You're a Gold Tamer now,
^P!?
I have no idea where that is on the
scale of awesomeness, but...
In any case, that's really cool!
translation:
Whoa! You're a Gold Tamer now,
^P!?
I have no idea where that is on the
scale of awesomeness, but...
In any case, that's really cool!

original:
This is rough...
Those kidnapped Tamers...
They must be fairly strong if they
were fighting the Selectors, right?
Then how could they have been
defeated so easily...?
Not to mention they even had their
leader, Kernel, with them...
Hmmm... This is the worst...
translation:
This is rough...
Those kidnapped Tamers...
They must be fairly strong if they
were fighting the Selectors, right?
Then how could they have been
defeated so easily...?
Not to mention they even had their
leader, Kernel, with them...
Hmmm... This is the worst...

original:
Thank you, ^P.
I don't remember much, but...
If you hadn't come to that city...

I probably would have been lost 
and confused there forever...
translation:
Thank you, ^P.
I don't remember much, but...
If you hadn't come to that city...

I probably would have been lost 
and confused there forever...

original:
So the Local Champion of South
City is that Tres kid...
A Numemon city? What?
A city packed with Numemon??
Whoa...
.........
That kid had always had a 
Numemon from the start, huh...
Maybe she intended to protect
it from the Selectors?
translation:
So the Local Champion of South
City is that Tres kid...
A Numemon city? What?
A city packed with Numemon??
Whoa...
.........
That kid had always had a 
Numemon from the start, huh...
Maybe she intended to protect
it from the Selectors?

original:
What? You also beat the Local
Champion of West City?
Amazing, ^P!
You're really moving up!
translation:
What? You also beat the Local
Champion of West City?
Amazing, ^P!
You're really moving up!

original:
Great job, ^P!
This sure is a big achievement♪
Not only did you find and bring Yui
and Takuto back...
But you also defeated all of the
Local Champions!
translation:
Great job, ^P!
This sure is a big achievement♪
Not only did you find and bring Yui
and Takuto back...
But you also defeated all of the
Local Champions!

original:
Say, is the DigiColosseum really
such a great place?
I mean, the Digimon get excited
just hearing its name...
If it's as incredible as they say,
I'd like to go there, myself.
translation:
Say, is the DigiColosseum really
such a great place?
I mean, the Digimon get excited
just hearing its name...
If it's as incredible as they say,
I'd like to go there, myself.

original:
Congratulations, ^P!

You're a Brozen Tamer now, huh?
I'm kinda jealous♪
Keep at it and continue rising
higher!
translation:
Congratulations, ^P!

You're a Brozen Tamer now, huh?
I'm kinda jealous♪
Keep at it and continue rising
higher!

original:
Wow! Incredible!
You're a Silver Tamer!♪
Congratulations, ^P♪

You do have that kind of Silver
Tamer aura about you, now...
Hahahaha...♪
translation:
Wow! Incredible!
You're a Silver Tamer!♪
Congratulations, ^P♪

You do have that kind of Silver
Tamer aura about you, now...
Hahahaha...♪

original:
Whoa, you're Gold Tamer now?!
Great job, ^P!♪
Nothing scares you now, huh?
Kyaaa♪ How cool!
translation:
Whoa, you're Gold Tamer now?!
Great job, ^P!♪
Nothing scares you now, huh?
Kyaaa♪ How cool!

original:
Now may not be the time...
Actually, it's the perfect time.
Congratulations on ranking up to
Platinum Tamer!
You're become a truly incredible
Tamer!
That's why everyone showers you
in praise and expectations!
And that's why...

The only one who can save those
kidnapped Tamers... Is you.
translation:
Now may not be the time...
Actually, it's the perfect time.
Congratulations on ranking up to
Platinum Tamer!
You're become a truly incredible
Tamer!
That's why everyone showers you
in praise and expectations!
And that's why...

The only one who can save those
kidnapped Tamers... Is you.

original:
Say, is Graphics Board
Continent a good place?
Everyone who disappeared from
Motherboard are there, right?
If no one comes back then...
It must be a good place... right?
translation:
Say, is Graphics Board
Continent a good place?
Everyone who disappeared from
Motherboard are there, right?
If no one comes back then...
It must be a good place... right?

original:
While I'm happy that Asuka was
found and brought back safely...
Something bothers me...

All those Tamers missing from
Motherboard Continent...
Did they really turn up on Graphics
Board Continent...?
translation:
While I'm happy that Asuka was
found and brought back safely...
Something bothers me...

All those Tamers missing from
Motherboard Continent...
Did they really turn up on Graphics
Board Continent...?

original:
I see, so Yui and Takuto aren't
in South City...
Hmm... Maybe they're in West
City, or possibly North City...?
translation:
I see, so Yui and Takuto aren't
in South City...
Hmm... Maybe they're in West
City, or possibly North City...?

original:
Yui and Takuto weren't in
West City, either?
.........
.........
T-then they must be in North
City, right? Right??
translation:
Yui and Takuto weren't in
West City, either?
.........
.........
T-then they must be in North
City, right? Right??

original:
I'm so glad you found Yui and
Takuto♪
It's all thanks to your hard work,
^P♪
translation:
I'm so glad you found Yui and
Takuto♪
It's all thanks to your hard work,
^P♪

original:
How was the DigiColosseum?
Great? Pretty? Big??
Ahhh, I'm so curious!

Even out of those from 
Motherboard Contient,
The only ones who can see the
Colosseum are of your caliber!
translation:
How was the DigiColosseum?
Great? Pretty? Big??
Ahhh, I'm so curious!

Even out of those from 
Motherboard Contient,
The only ones who can see the
Colosseum are of your caliber!

original:
So how does it feel to be a 
Bronze Tamer?
Do you feel stronger?
Not really? Then how do you feel??
translation:
So how does it feel to be a 
Bronze Tamer?
Do you feel stronger?
Not really? Then how do you feel??

original:
So how does it feel to be a 
Silver Tamer?
Do you feel like some sort of 
chosen Tamer? No??
translation:
So how does it feel to be a 
Silver Tamer?
Do you feel like some sort of 
chosen Tamer? No??

original:
So how does it feel to be a 
Gold Tamer?
Do you think no one can stand up to
you? No? Then how do you feel??
translation:
So how does it feel to be a 
Gold Tamer?
Do you think no one can stand up to
you? No? Then how do you feel??

original:
So how does it feel to be a 
Platinum Tamer?
Being the only person in the Digital
World who can save it...
...How does that feel?

If I understood that feeling, maybe
I could help you...
Is what I thought, but even now,
I just can't understand anything.
translation:
So how does it feel to be a 
Platinum Tamer?
Being the only person in the Digital
World who can save it...
...How does that feel?

If I understood that feeling, maybe
I could help you...
Is what I thought, but even now,
I just can't understand anything.

original:
Huh? Why am I so close to you?
I-I'm not that close!
I-It's just because it's so narrow
here...!
translation:
Huh? Why am I so close to you?
I-I'm not that close!
I-It's just because it's so narrow
here...!

original:
Huh? Why am I so close to you?
I-I'm not that close!
I-It's just because it's so narrow
here...!
translation:
Huh? Why am I so close to you?
I-I'm not that close!
I-It's just because it's so narrow
here...!

original:
Since you're able to participate in
the DigiColosseum...
Then does that mean your skills 
have been recognized...?
We're all rooting for you!

I know you can become the 
greatest Tamer in the Digital World!
translation:
Since you're able to participate in
the DigiColosseum...
Then does that mean your skills 
have been recognized...?
We're all rooting for you!

I know you can become the 
greatest Tamer in the Digital World!

original:
So you've become a Bronze
Tamer? Well done♪
While I don't really understand how
awesome that makes you...
I do know that you really are
awesome, ^P!
translation:
So you've become a Bronze
Tamer? Well done♪
While I don't really understand how
awesome that makes you...
I do know that you really are
awesome, ^P!

original:
So you've become a Silver
Tamer? Well done♪
I saw you on the monitor. You
really are strong!
I'm seeing you in a whole new light!
translation:
So you've become a Silver
Tamer? Well done♪
I saw you on the monitor. You
really are strong!
I'm seeing you in a whole new light!

original:
Wow, you're a Gold Tamer now?!
Congratulations!♪
Do you know what everyone said
when they watched you earlier...?
"^P really is the greatest 
Tamer in the Digital World!"!♪
translation:
Wow, you're a Gold Tamer now?!
Congratulations!♪
Do you know what everyone said
when they watched you earlier...?
"^P really is the greatest 
Tamer in the Digital World!"!♪

original:
Just before the Selectors appeared
at the DigiColosseum...
I felt a really strange sensation...

I thought of helping everyone 
escape from the Colosseum, but...
I wasn't able to do anything...
translation:
Just before the Selectors appeared
at the DigiColosseum...
I felt a really strange sensation...

I thought of helping everyone 
escape from the Colosseum, but...
I wasn't able to do anything...

original:
What am I doing here?
It's... nothing important.
I'll just get in everyone's way if I
hang around the Entrance...
And well... being here...
I'm closer to Yui... so...
Erm... uhmmm...
translation:
What am I doing here?
It's... nothing important.
I'll just get in everyone's way if I
hang around the Entrance...
And well... being here...
I'm closer to Yui... so...
Erm... uhmmm...

original:
What am I doing here?
It's... nothing important.
I'll just get in everyone's way if I
hang around the Entrance...
And well... being here...
I'm closer to Yui... so...
Erm... uhmmm...
translation:
What am I doing here?
It's... nothing important.
I'll just get in everyone's way if I
hang around the Entrance...
And well... being here...
I'm closer to Yui... so...
Erm... uhmmm...

original:
The DigiColosseum...

When I had become the Local
Champion of North City...
I turned down the chance to enter
the DigiColosseum...
I don't have any regrets, but...

It always felt a little off...
I can't quite explain why, though...
translation:
The DigiColosseum...

When I had become the Local
Champion of North City...
I turned down the chance to enter
the DigiColosseum...
I don't have any regrets, but...

It always felt a little off...
I can't quite explain why, though...

original:
You're a Bronze Tamer?
Great job, ^P!
But I'm sure you can do even 
better than that!
translation:
You're a Bronze Tamer?
Great job, ^P!
But I'm sure you can do even 
better than that!

original:
You're a Silver Tamer?
Great! Congratulations!
But I think you can do a lot better
than this, ^P...
translation:
You're a Silver Tamer?
Great! Congratulations!
But I think you can do a lot better
than this, ^P...

original:
You're a Gold Tamer?
Congratulations! Just as expected!
I know you'd be able to at least
reach Gold level.
translation:
You're a Gold Tamer?
Congratulations! Just as expected!
I know you'd be able to at least
reach Gold level.

original:
When you defeated the Bandits...

Yui mentioned she felt something
bad was going to happen...
But I don't think anyone expected
something like this...
We're all shocked...
translation:
When you defeated the Bandits...

Yui mentioned she felt something
bad was going to happen...
But I don't think anyone expected
something like this...
We're all shocked...

original:
The DigiShip is now in tip-top
shape!
Ready to tackle any trouble 
Graphics Board throws at you!
translation:
The DigiShip is now in tip-top
shape!
Ready to tackle any trouble 
Graphics Board throws at you!

original:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!
translation:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!

original:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!
translation:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!

original:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!
translation:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!

original:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!
translation:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
You can leave any time!

original:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
Good luck, ^P!
translation:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
Good luck, ^P!

original:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
Good luck, ^P!
translation:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
Good luck, ^P!

original:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
Good luck, ^P!
translation:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
Good luck, ^P!

original:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
Good luck, ^P!
translation:
The DigiShip is in perfect shape!
Good luck, ^P!

original:
While the DigiShip is in perfect
shape...
Please be careful out there,
^P!
translation:
While the DigiShip is in perfect
shape...
Please be careful out there,
^P!

original:
Hey, ^P! I've got some
good info for you!
You can find Chimeramonβ's plate
through Expeditions!
However, only level 30+ Champion
level Digimon can find it!
translation:
Hey, ^P! I've got some
good info for you!
You can find Chimeramonβ's plate
through Expeditions!
However, only level 30+ Champion
level Digimon can find it!

original:
Oh, I hear you're collecting Bug
Plates, ^P?
You can get LucemonＦＭβ's Plate
from an Expedition!
But you need a level 38+ Ultimate
Digimon to find it!
translation:
Oh, I hear you're collecting Bug
Plates, ^P?
You can get LucemonＦＭβ's Plate
from an Expedition!
But you need a level 38+ Ultimate
Digimon to find it!

original:
Hello, ^P, zansu!

Thank you so much for getting our
scroll back, zansu!
We really appreciate it, zansu!

With this, we can continue our
cooking training, Zansu!
translation:
Hello, ^P, zansu!

Thank you so much for getting our
scroll back, zansu!
We really appreciate it, zansu!

With this, we can continue our
cooking training, Zansu!

original:
Are there any Digimon here on
Motherboard Continent...
That we could use as ingredients
for our cooking...?
...Just kidding, zansu!
translation:
Are there any Digimon here on
Motherboard Continent...
That we could use as ingredients
for our cooking...?
...Just kidding, zansu!

original:
You still haven't returned the 
shotgun I lent you...
I'll just wait here until I can get
it back from you.
...It's not like I don't trust you
or anything, though, okay?
translation:
You still haven't returned the 
shotgun I lent you...
I'll just wait here until I can get
it back from you.
...It's not like I don't trust you
or anything, though, okay?

original:
The shop in the DigiBase is so
convenient... I use it often!
translation:
The shop in the DigiBase is so
convenient... I use it often!

original:
My next goal...
Maybe to get even stronger...?
translation:
My next goal...
Maybe to get even stronger...?
